#geomob

London meetup focused on geoinnovation - for fun or profit.
 
Home > 22 Sep 2010

october geomob event

DATE

October 21st (Thursday),  18:30h

LOCATION

University College London

Pearson Lecture Theatre (North East Entrance)

Pearson Building

Gower Street, London, WC1E 6BT (map)

SPEAKERS

  • Max Howell of TweetDeck topic to be announced
  • Matt Watkins of Chromaroma  an online multiplayer game played out as you travel the city of London with your Oyster Card
  • Oliver O’Brien of UCL  visualizing the London Cycle Hire Scheme
  • Eugene Tsyrklevich of Parkopedia developing a location based mobile app for non-geeks. Lessons learned in Parkopedia’s partnership with the AA

AGENDA

18:30 pre-talk networking
19:00 Max Howell / TweetDeck
19:20 Matt Watkins / Chromaroma
19:40 Oliver O'Brien / London Cycle Hire Scheme
20:00 Eugene Tsyrklevich / Parkopedia
20:30 to the pub!

Geobeers will be had at the Jeremy Bentham pub

PLEASE SIGN UP AS “ATTENDING” for this event on lanyrd

**Follow [@geomob](http://twitter.com/geomob "geomob on twitter") on Twitter**

A BIG THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:

PROfounders Capital

Lokku Ltd

Cloudmade

THANK YOU TO THE UCL GEOGRAPHY DEPARTMENT FOR HOSTING THE EVENT

see you there!
